AddTagsToStream.name: AddTagsToStream
AddTagsToStream.description:
Adds or updates tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream. Each stream can have
                                                up to 10 tags.

DecreaseStreamRetentionPeriod.name: DecreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
DecreaseStreamRetentionPeriod.description:
Decreases the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records
                                                are accessible after they are added to the stream.

DeleteStream.name: DeleteStream
DeleteStream.description: Deletes a stream and all its shards and data.

DeregisterStreamConsumer.name: DeregisterStreamConsumer
DeregisterStreamConsumer.description: Deregisters a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream.

DescribeLimits.name: DescribeLimits
DescribeLimits.description: Describes the shard limits and usage for the account.

DescribeStreamConsumer.name: DescribeStreamConsumer
DescribeStreamConsumer.description: Gets the description of a registered stream consumer.

DescribeStreamSummary.name: DescribeStreamSummary
DescribeStreamSummary.description:
Provides a summarized description of the specified Kinesis data stream without the
                                                shard list.

GetRecords.name: GetRecords
GetRecords.description: Gets data records from a shard.

GetShardIterator.name: GetShardIterator
GetShardIterator.description:
Gets a shard iterator. A shard iterator expires five minutes after it is returned
                                                to the requester.

IncreaseStreamRetentionPeriod.name: IncreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
IncreaseStreamRetentionPeriod.description:
Increases the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records
                                                are accessible after they are added to the stream.

ListShards.name: ListShards
ListShards.description: Lists the shards in a stream and provides information about each shard.

ListStreamConsumers.name: ListStreamConsumers
ListStreamConsumers.description:
Lists the stream consumers registered to receive data from a Kinesis stream using
                                                enhanced fan-out, and provides information about each consumer.

ListTagsForStream.name: ListTagsForStream
ListTagsForStream.description: Lists the tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream.

MergeShards.name: MergeShards
MergeShards.description:
Merges two adjacent shards in a stream and combines them into a single shard to reduce
                                                the stream's capacity to ingest and transport data.

PutRecord.name: PutRecord
PutRecord.description: Writes a single data record from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream.

PutRecords.name: PutRecords
PutRecords.description:
Writes multiple data records from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream in a single
                                                call (also referred to as a PutRecords request).

RegisterStreamConsumer.name: RegisterStreamConsumer
RegisterStreamConsumer.description: Registers a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream.

StartStreamEncryption.name: StartStreamEncryption
StartStreamEncryption.description:
Grants permission to enable or update server-side encryption using an AWS KMS key
                                                for a specified stream.

StopStreamEncryption.name: StopStreamEncryption
StopStreamEncryption.description: Grants permission to disable server-side encryption for a specified stream.

SubscribeToShard.name: SubscribeToShard
SubscribeToShard.description: Listening to a specific shard with enhanced fan-out.

UpdateShardCount.name: UpdateShardCount
UpdateShardCount.description: Updates the shard count of the specified stream to the specified number of shards.
